title: [feature request]  Update Tutorials for GPUs
body_html:
https://pytorch.org/tutorials/intermediate/char_rnn_classification_tutorial.html
Above tutorial is running on CPU. by using the following piece of code it is meant to run on GPU but it is not happening.
dtype = torch.float
device = torch.device("cpu")
dtype = torch.device("cuda:0") # Uncomment this to run on GPU
I have CUDA version 8. and my GPU is Nvidia 1050ti
Can you guide me on how to execute your given tutorials on GPU

body:
https://pytorch.org/tutorials/intermediate/char_rnn_classification_tutorial.html
Above tutorial is running on CPU. by using the following piece of code it is meant to run on GPU but it is not happening.
`dtype = torch.float`
`device = torch.device("cpu")`
`dtype = torch.device("cuda:0") # Uncomment this to run on GPU`
 I have CUDA version 8. and my GPU is Nvidia 1050ti 
Can you guide me on how to execute your given tutorials on GPU
